title: Double Delight
description:
Samantha thinks she may have given up on men altogether, especially after the string of bad relationships she's recently had.But she didn't expect that two of the male strippers at her friend Claire's bachelorette party would be twins, and good looking one's at that. She also didn't expect that she'd end up back at their apartment that same night.Now all her friends have found out, and Claire isn't happy with her for ruining the bachelorette party. To make matters worse, Reeve (one of the twins) is acting strange towards her. Samantha needs to grow up fast before she loses everything again.
Short story: approx 5,800 words
author: Tabitha Levin
